Name: Meteor Volleyball!
About the game: Meteor Volleyball! is a simple, fun, comic-like volleyball game that simulates your life if there were a meteor heading towards Earth and you have to survive by piloting a volleyball robot. Comic-like cut scene and fun dialogue. 2D platform volleyball game. Very simple control. Various Special Skills. Story The earth is in danger of being destroyed by a huge meteorite! Thanks to a genius Doctor, we can deflect meteorites! But then... Oh my gosh! This time, countless meteorites are falling! If a meteor lands, your house will be destroyed! Pilot the robot to protect our house!
